body_html:
Hi @hydrogenpi, for instructions on how to install TF on Windows please follow the installation docs, you will find all the information necessary to successfully install it. The remaining questions are more suitable for StackOverflow where you may reach for community support. Github is strictly for bugs and feature requests as unfortunately isn't possible to help each case due high demand.

If you have any further doubt regarding TensorFlow specifically feel free to ask.

body:
Hi @hydrogenpi, for instructions on how to install TF on Windows please follow the [installation docs](https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_windows), you will find all the information necessary to successfully install it. The remaining questions are more suitable for StackOverflow where you may reach for community support. Github is strictly for bugs and feature requests as unfortunately isn't possible to help each case due high demand.

If you have any further doubt regarding TensorFlow specifically feel free to ask.
